author: ForrestKnight
description:
Java 25 cleans house with the additions of 18 new JEPs that include flexible constructor bodies, scoped values, structured concurency, primitive pattern matching, compact object headers, new crypto APIs, and more. Basically a bunch of changes that make Java more approachable to new devs and less painful to use for experienced devs.

Try out CodeCrafters to become a better
software engineer (not for beginners): https://app.codecrafters.io/join?via=ForrestKnight (40% off when using my link)

JDK 25: https://openjdk.org/projects/jdk/25/
Watch the official Java 25 Launch Stream, they are obviously way smarter than me: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=duIceCXObrA&ab_channel=Java

If you're a developer, sign up to my free newsletter Dev Notes 👉 https://www.devnotesdaily.com/

If you're a student, checkout my Notion template Studious: https://notionstudent.com

Don't know why you'd want to follow me on other socials. I don't even post. But here you go.
🐱‍🚀 GitHub: https://github.com/forrestkn
title: Java just got cleaner
